animeDescription: Animated 2002 short film produced by Studio Ghibli for their near exclusive use in the Ghibli Museum. It features famous director Miyazaki Hayao himself as narrator (in the form of a humanoid pig, reminiscent of Porco from Porco Rosso), telling the story of flight and the many machines imagined to achieve it.  Note: The film could also be seen on the in-flight entertainment system used by Japan Airlines.  (Source: AniDB)
animeStaff: [['Suzuki Toshio', ['Producer']], ['Miyazaki Hayao', ['Director', 'Script', 'Screenplay', 'Original Creator']], ['Hisaishi Joe', ['Music']], ['Yonebayashi Hiromasa', ['Animation Director']]]
